      This is a list of balls on the board

      This is a list of gadgets on the board
      private static double GRAVITY
      A constant describing the effective force of gravity on the ball
      private java.util.ArrayList<BoardObject> inhabitants
      This is a list of board objects on the board
      private static double MU_1
      A set of constants describing the effects of friction on movement
      private static double MU_2 
      private static double TIME_EPSILON
      A constant providing a buffer zone to prevent abnormalities in the action of various items on the board due to rounding errors in calculating the time it takes to collide with another object
      private int xDim
      This is the maximal coordinate in the x direction
      private int yDim
      This is the maximal coordinate in the y direction

      • connectWall

        public boolean connectWall(java.lang.String wall,
                  Board boardToBeConnected,
                  java.lang.String wallToBeConnected)
        Connects a wall in the board to another wall in the board specified
        Parameters:
        wall - Specifies which wall in this board we want to connect to another
        boardToBeConnected - Specifies which other board we want to connect our wall to
        wallToBeConnected - Specifies which other wall in the other board we want to connect our wall to
        Returns:
        true if the connection process was successful and false otherwise

      • progress

        public void progress(double timeStep)
        Advances the whole board one step forward by a time step, assuming *NO* collisions occur
        Parameters:
